synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The two DMA molecules in the ASU are replaced by two DMF molecules and one H2O molecule.

synthesis_conditions.irradiation_time: Limited to maintain single crystal integrity
synthesis_conditions.yield: 60 % (as observed in SCXRD analysis), near 100 % conversion suggested by NMR analysis

synthesis_conditions.irradiation_time: Shorter for CdPCP·DMF than for CdPCP·DMA
synthesis_conditions.yield: Near-quantitative conversion to the cyclized form as confirmed by SCXRD analysis

synthesis_conditions.solvent_exchange: Performed with THF, 1,4-dioxane, benzene, toluene, chloroform, and carbon tetrachloride
synthesis_conditions.observations: Cyclization observed for THF and 1,4-dioxane solvates between the 2D layers. Toluene solvate showed cyclization in both positions. No cycloaddition observed for CCl4 solvate despite repeated attempts.
